The following 3rd-party applications are bundled as it for your convenience:

par2cmdline with thread building blocks, 32-bit and 64-bit version
License: GPL
Source available at: http://www.chuchusoft.com/par2_tbb/index.html

phpar2 available at : http://paulhoule.com/phpar2/
License: GPL

7zip 
from https://www.7-zip.org
license : https://www.7-zip.org/license.txt

Unrar
from https://www.rarlab.com/download.htm
